channel.title: postgres on Ed-M.dev
channel.description: Recent content in postgres on Ed-M.dev

item.description: 220827 I have moved to getting keycloak to install via a manual installation( kubectl ). I have finished postgres sql. Its rather straight forward and there is a lot material for about installation via a quick a web search.
220630 0645 Okay while looking through the code for the channels I realized I had not run it since moving everything to a new drive and while also looking at it kinda confused.

211221 Database CRUD operations integration Working to get the CRUD operation working correctly with the GORM and the database. Create (AddServer) Auto increment is on for gorm Update Get {id} Note that the model object has been added to the server model but is only turn on in the json for the update/delete testing
